title: Dual Wielder
content: le.Dual Wielding Longswords or Rapiers is also extremely cool and you should always remember to put the theme and roleplay of your character over min/maxing. Thieves (or anyone with additional bonus actions) will do an additional +1 damage using Rapier in the offhand with each attack, for a total of 2 more damage using this feat compared to the +2 Dexterity choice if they do not have the dual wielding fighting style.
